clinical_history: Patient with chronic dyspnea and smoking history.
findings: Enlarged lymph nodes in right upper lobe, suggestive of lymphadenopathy.
Mediastinal widening observed with soft tissue density.
Pulmonary embolism suspected; filling defect in segmental artery of right upper lobe.
Interstitial thickening and reticular pattern in right upper lobe.
Patchy ground-glass opacities noted in right upper lobe.
Emphysematous changes with hyperlucency in right upper lobe.
recommendations: Further evaluation with PET-CT recommended if malignancy suspected.
